ValidationRule.description: As soon as the ICONiCS Details Status = Created in MyRepairs, the Destination field is no more editable
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'DistantCareService', ISCHANGED( destination__c ) , NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'New Request'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Assigned'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Pending Customer information'), ISPICKVAL( ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c , 'Initiated in MyRepairs as a Draft'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(ICONiCS_Status_Detail__c ),'Initiated in MyRepairs as a Draft') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not edit destination after order creation in MyRepairs
